author: Oliver O'Connell, Oliver O'Connell
title: China hits out at 'absurd' lawsuit by Missouri governor demanding damages over coronavirus
description: 'This so-called lawsuit is very absurd and has no factual and legal basis at all' says foreign ministry spokesperson
content:
China has described a lawsuit brought against it by the US state of Missouri as very absurd.
Speaking on Wednesday, foreign ministry spokesperson Geng Shuang said that the suit, which concerns Chinas handling of the coronavirus pandemic, has no factual and l… [+2497 chars]
